description: Mayu is a girl suffering from androphobia who is sent by Ryouko Ninomiya to live with Shungo to get over her fear. She and her brother are succubi, which in this series refers to people with special abilities of attracting members of the opposite sex and feeding on their life force. However, Mayu cannot control her power, which causes her to be chased by men often.
name: Tsukimura Mayu
